item.title: 3 and simple ways to get easy homework ;D ;)
item.dc:creator: @celtic_llama celtic llama
item.description:
@celtic_llama wrote:

Aukake are you an american?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 21, 2006, 04:16:18 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Aukake, post:6, topic:7343”][quote author=dazkilla link=topic=10252.msg114997#msg114997 date=1154489101]
Yea, Realy. The point of education is for you to LEARN something. (Gasp!) Alot of ppl don’t get the concept…
[/quote]

Homework is really for study habits and to review, at least that’s what I have deduced. Some people such as myself despise homework because we listen to the lectures(the actual education) given in class and do not require further review. I also will form my own habits as I please without the influence of the school and the american school system can go to the shits for all I care as I learn much more from the internet and surrounding influences such as my parents and peers.[/quote]you know just because your school system sucks doesnt mean mine does.

Read full topic
